# Maps {#sec-maps}

Passage of the sloop Thornton from Victoria to the Queen Charlotte islands (now called Haida Gwaii).

## Map 1

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(leaflet)
library(sf)

# 1) Read the GeoJSON
pts <- st_read("kml/points.geojson", quiet = TRUE)
lns <- st_read("kml/paths.geojson", quiet = TRUE)

# 2) Web maps expect lon/lat (EPSG:4326)
pts <- st_transform(pts, 4326)

# 3) Leaflet map (same syntax style you used)
m <- leaflet() %>%
  # Base groups
  addTiles(group = "OSM (default)") %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron, group = "Positron (minimal)") %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldImagery, group = "World Imagery (satellite)")    %>%
  # Overlay groups
  addCircleMarkers(
    data = pts,
    radius = 5,
    stroke = TRUE,
    weight = 1,
    fillOpacity = 0.8,
    popup = ~sprintf(
      "<b>%s</b><br/>%s",
      Name,
      Descriptio
    )
  ) %>%
  addPolylines(data = lns, color = "#444444", weight = 1, smoothFactor = 0.5) %>%
  # Layers control
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c(
      "OSM (default)",
      "Positron (minimal)",
      "World Imagery (satellite)"
    ),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
  )

m




```
